item.title: [PI]A noob code ruining Pure combat system
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:2, topic:405137”] if(itemName.contains("rune")) { if(!itemName.contains("knife") && !itemName.contains("dart") && !itemName.contains("javelin") && !itemName.contains("axe") && !itemName.contains("'bow") && !itemName.contains("shield") && !itemName.contains("helm") && !itemName.contains("body") && !itemName.contains("legs") && !itemName.contains("boot")) { c.attackLevelReq = 40; } else { c.defenceLevelReq = 40; } return; please use common sense and read the code.[/quote]

Ok It works with rune scimi, but:rune knives and rune ´bow not working, do I delete them from the code?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]A noob code ruining Pure combat system

item.title: [PI]A noob code ruining Pure combat system
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

It works :), and for rune I make the same? heres the original code:

if(itemName.contains("rune")) { if(!itemName.contains("knife") && !itemName.contains("dart") && !itemName.contains("javelin") && !itemName.contains("thrownaxe") && !itemName.contains("'bow")) { c.attackLevelReq = c.defenceLevelReq = 40; } return;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]A noob code ruining Pure combat system
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

When I try to wield dragon scimi, dragons daggers, rune scimi, and rune arrows (checked items that not working)
when I try to wiled them they ask for defence.

Please help me on this

I know that is like that, but a code It’s ruining everything look:

if(itemName.contains("dragon")) { if (!itemName.contains("nti-") && !itemName.contains("fire")) { c.attackLevelReq = c.defenceLevelReq = 60; return;
The code above is telling me that any item with the term “dragon” its telling that you need 60 att & def, maybe change it to this?

if(itemName.contains("dragon")) { if (!itemName.contains("nti-") && !itemName.contains("fire")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 60; return;
Not working :S, any idea?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]A noob code ruining Pure combat system
